description:
Hoshina Lily comes from a family of violin repairers and is a detective that works for the http://anidb.net/ch95414 [Royal Investigative Service]. She is very immature, rash, and unprofessional, often behaving like a scatterbrained child. Despite this, she is an extremely competent detective who takes her job seriously when necessary.
Source: B: The Beginning Wiki
name: Hoshina Lily
